subsc:

trustfund:
TF039168-ANGOLA - INFRASTRUCTURE REHAB
            ENGINEERING - ICR,TF039040-ANGOLA - INFRASTRUCTURE REHABILITATION,TF037548-YEMEN - EDUCATION PORTFOLIO -
            MNA REGION

abstracts.cdata!:
The primary objective of the project is
            to support the economic recovery and further development of
            Angola infrastructure by means of the rehabilitation of key
            transport and urban systems, and assist in the formulation
            of policies, strategies, rehabilitation plans, and programs
            of continuing maintenance.  The project consists of the
            following principal elements: (1) economic and financial
            feasibility and basic engineering studies and environmental
            assessments for the rehabilitation and maintenance of the
            National Basic Highway Network, the Namibe Port Transport
            System, the Urban Infrastructure of the City of Luanda and
            the Luanda Port Transport System; (2) final design and
            preparation of tender documents for selected priority
            investments identified in the above studies; (3) technical
            assistance for the Ministry of Planning and the Luanda
            Provincial Government (urban), the Ministry of Transport
            & Communications (ports and railways) and the Ministry
            of Public Works and Urban Development (highways); (4) human
            resource development and initial training programs; (5)
            repair or replacement of some equipment elements of the
            system; (6) provision of office and residential facilities.
